sentences.en: A shower of confetti fell on the newly - married couple outside the church.
sentences.cn: 在教堂外,一阵雨点般的五彩纸屑撒落在一对新婚的新人身上.

sentences.en: But the purple confetti fell again Thursday, this time with particular meaning.
sentences.cn: 但是就在星期四,紫金王朝盛世再次降临, 此次意义非同一般.

sentences.en: Confetti showered down on the newly - weds.
sentences.cn: 彩屑撒在一双新人身上.

sentences.en: Confetti, streamers, candles are available in this shop.
sentences.cn: 五彩纸屑, 彩带, 蜡烛,这店里都有得卖.

sentences.en: Crowds were just filling the skyscrapers and throwing out confetti.
sentences.cn: 到处都是人山人海,人们挥洒着庆祝的糖果.

sentences.en: Do not throw confetti, and Cashew Nut Shell does not litter bags.
sentences.cn: 不乱扔纸屑, 不乱丢果壳和包装袋.

sentences.en: More than a ton of confetti, little pieces of paper, rains down on the crowd.
sentences.cn: 一吨多小纸片大小的五彩纸屑雨点般洒落在人群之中.

sentences.en: On New Year's, we will have a countdown to midnight and throw confetti.
sentences.cn: 新年时, 我们会倒数计时到午夜而且洒五彩碎纸.

sentences.en: People shower the newly - weds with confetti.
sentences.cn: 人们向新婚夫妇撒彩色纸屑.

sentences.en: The guests laugh, applaud, and confetti.
sentences.cn: 亲朋朋友欢笑鼓掌, 抛撒彩纸,庆贺美满婚姻.

sentences.en: The wedding guests were given confetti to fling at the bride and groom.
sentences.cn: 参加婚礼的客人们拿到了向新郎和新娘抛撒的五彩纸屑.

sentences.en: The winning team was showered with confetti.
We are looking for a machine to production of paper garland and confetti.
sentences.cn: 我们正在寻找糖果机械的供应商,请有货源者直接联系我们!

sentences.en: When the celebrations took place I couldn't understand why they had to use so much confetti.
sentences.cn: 直至庆祝的时候,我又不明白为什麽要放出那麽多纸条呢?

sentences.en: You could've chopped me into confetti by now if you were in tip - top condition.
sentences.cn: 你现在这种“巅峰 ” 状态可没法把我撕碎.

words.tran_cn: （婚礼、狂欢节中抛撒的）五彩纸屑；（旧时狂欢节或庆祝场合抛撒的）糖果

trans.tran_cn: （婚礼时撒在新娘新郎身上的）五彩纸屑
trans.tran_en: small pieces of coloured paper that you throw into the air over people who have just got married or at events such as parties,  parades  etc
